name: Limbo Library
description:
Limbo Library

It was another ordinary day of working at the library when — oh dear what happened — there are monsters everywhere and a talking skull in the corner mocking you! You try to find your way through the labyrinth of rooms but some curse has made it so that your day starts over after 60 seconds!

Limbo Library is a top-down shooter roguelike made for Ludum Dare 47. The theme was "stuck in a loop" and we ended up making a game that we described to ourselves as "Minit meets Enter the Gungeon".

  • Controller support.
  • ~5 minutes per playthrough.
  • Featuring talking skulls Maria and Louie. Oh, and the Li-bear-ian.
  • Made in 72h for Ludum Dare 47.

Controls

  • Move - 'W', 'A', 'S', 'D' keys  |  left joystick
  • Aim - mouse  |  right joystick
  • Shoot - left click  |  right shoulder button
  • Interact - 'Q' key |  'A' button
  • Blink (after obtained) - space  |  'X' button

Credits

  • kcaze and Lennart Jansson for making the game.
  • Fonts used are Bitty, 04B-25, and Little Witch
  • You for playing ❤️.
